name: The Monster of Castle Vöckla
description:
A group of monster hunters, led by the redoubtable Judith Schwartzstein, arrive at a small Translovakian village to investigate grim rumours.  As the team's chronicler, Gwendolynn, can you steer them to success? Or will you fall prey to the Monster of Castle Vöckla? * * *

The Monster of Castle Vöckla is a text adventure fan-game for the @Judith Hunts twitter bot. You don't need to be familiar with the bot to enjoy the game, but it's a really good bot so please go and follow it.  

Main characters and general setting were taken from the bot, which was written by @AYolland.
